item.title: Breakout: An RSS Reader...
item.description: THE RESULT (Requires javascript) When I started this project, my intention was to learn more about Javascript and the HTML5 canvas. I knew I wanted something interactive, and that a game would be an excellent place to begin. What started as a straight-forward tutorial project quickly began to teach me a valuable lesson about scope creep, among other things. All of those what-ifs can add weeks—if not months—to a project. That being said, I learned so much as I went, researching almost everything that finally made it into this creation.
